name: Spleen length (splenomegaly threshold)
clinical_significance: Splenomegaly - evaluate for hematologic, infectious, or portal hypertension causes
action_if_met: Consider hematologic workup, evaluate for portal hypertension

name: Spleen length (massive splenomegaly)
clinical_significance: Massive splenomegaly - myeloproliferative disorder, lymphoma, or Gaucher disease

name: Normal kidney length
clinical_significance: Normal adult kidney 9-12cm; <9cm suggests chronic kidney disease
action_if_not_met: Evaluate for CKD, renal artery stenosis

name: Renal cortical thickness (atrophy)
clinical_significance: Cortical thinning suggests chronic renal disease

name: Liver span (hepatomegaly)
clinical_significance: Hepatomegaly in MCL - evaluate for steatosis, congestion, infiltration

name: Pancreatic duct diameter (dilation)
clinical_significance: Dilated pancreatic duct - evaluate for obstruction, IPMN, chronic pancreatitis
action_if_met: MRCP or EUS for further evaluation

name: Pancreatic head width
clinical_significance: Enlarged pancreatic head - consider mass, pancreatitis, or normal variant

name: Pulmonary nodule - solid, low risk
clinical_significance: No routine follow-up needed per Fleischner 2017

name: Pulmonary nodule - solid, high risk threshold
clinical_significance: Consider PET-CT or biopsy per Fleischner
action_if_met: CT at 3 months, then PET or biopsy

name: Thyroid nodule - biopsy threshold TR3
clinical_significance: TR3 nodule >=2.5cm: FNA recommended

name: Thyroid nodule - biopsy threshold TR4
clinical_significance: TR4 nodule >=1.5cm: FNA recommended

name: Thyroid nodule - biopsy threshold TR5
clinical_significance: TR5 highly suspicious nodule >=1cm: FNA recommended

name: Ovarian cyst - simple, premenopausal
clinical_significance: Simple cyst <=5cm in premenopausal: likely physiologic, no follow-up

name: Ovarian cyst - surgical consideration
clinical_significance: Large cyst >7cm: consider surgical evaluation regardless of appearance

name: Prostate volume (BPH)
clinical_significance: Enlarged prostate - BPH if >30cc

name: PSA density threshold
clinical_significance: PSA density >0.15 increases cancer suspicion

name: Common bile duct diameter
clinical_significance: Dilated CBD (>6mm, or >8mm post-cholecystectomy) - evaluate for obstruction
action_if_met: MRCP or EUS, evaluate for choledocholithiasis or stricture

name: Lymph node short axis (pathologic)
clinical_significance: Short axis >10mm generally considered pathologic (except inguinal >15mm)

name: Retroperitoneal lymph node (pathologic)
clinical_significance: Retroperitoneal node >10mm short axis suspicious for lymphoma or metastasis

name: Aortic aneurysm threshold
clinical_significance: Abdominal aortic aneurysm definition threshold

name: AAA surgical repair threshold
clinical_significance: AAA >=5.5cm: surgical repair typically indicated
action_if_met: Vascular surgery referral for repair consideration

name: Thoracic aortic aneurysm threshold
clinical_significance: Thoracic aortic aneurysm definition (varies by location)

name: Thoracic aorta repair threshold
clinical_significance: Ascending aorta >=5.5cm: repair typically indicated (lower threshold in Marfan)

name: Adrenal adenoma threshold (washout)
clinical_significance: Absolute washout >=60% highly specific for adenoma

name: Adrenal lesion unenhanced HU
clinical_significance: Unenhanced attenuation <=10 HU diagnostic for lipid-rich adenoma
